options.content:
VM Name: ${ResourceName} Operating System: ${vm_os}
Resource Group: ${ResourceGroup} Size: ${vm_size}
Status: ${vm_status} OS Disk Size (GB): ${vm_osdisksize}
Location: ${vm_location} Data Disk Size (GB): ${vm_datadisksize}
Free Disk %: ${vm_freedisk}

azureLogAnalytics.query:
//change this example to create your own time series query
<table name>                                                              //the table to query (e.g. Usage, Heartbeat, Perf)
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)                                      //this is a macro used to show the full chart’s time range, choose the datetime column here
| summarize count() by <group by column>, bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval) //change “group by column” to a column in your table, such as “Computer”. The $__interval macro is used to auto-select the time grain. Can also use 1h, 5m etc.
| order by TimeGenerated asc

//change this example to create your own time series query
<table name>                                                              //the table to query (e.g. Usage, Heartbeat, Perf)

azureResourceGraph.query:
Resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
| where name == '${ResourceName}'
| project tostring(properties.extended.instanceView.powerState.code)

Resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
| where name == '${ResourceName}'
| project location

Resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
| where name == '${ResourceName}'
| project tostring(properties.hardwareProfile.vmSize)

Resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
| where name == '${ResourceName}'
| project strcat(properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType, ' (', properties.storageProfile.imageReference.offer, ')')

Resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
| where name == '${ResourceName}'
| project properties.storageProfile.osDisk.diskSizeGB

Resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
| where name == '${ResourceName}'
| extend dataDisks = properties.storageProfile.dataDisks
| mv-expand dataDisks
| project dataDiskSizeGB = todouble(dataDisks.diskSizeGB)
| summarize totalDiskSizeGB = sum(dataDiskSizeGB)
| project tostring(totalDiskSizeGB)

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let DiskPerf = Perf
| where ObjectName in ("Logical Disk", "LogicalDisk") and InstanceName in ("total", "_Total")  and Computer == '${ResourceName}'
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, CounterName, InstanceName, CounterValue;
 DiskPerf
| where CounterName == "% Free Space"
| summarize avgPercentFreeSpace = round(avg(CounterValue), 0) by Computer, InstanceName
| project tostring(avgPercentFreeSpace)

azureResourceGraph.query:
let DiskPerf = Perf
| where ObjectName == "Logical Disk" and InstanceName == "total"  and Computer == 'vm-par'
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, CounterName, InstanceName, CounterValue;
 DiskPerf
| where CounterName == "% Free Space"
| summarize avgPercentFreeSpace = round(avg(CounterValue), 0) by Computer, InstanceName
| project avgPercentFreeSpace

Resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
| where name == '${ResourceName}'
| project id
